' ## from v2-0 on the hierarchy is no longer linked by a property on "Document Book", but by relationships to top "Document Sections" ' ' ## this logic is obsolete and de-activated from Server Events on ItemType "Document Book" ' ' ## it is kept as an example how to auto create and link a top node of a hierarchy to "Document Book's" property linking to top node !!! ' ' called onAfterAdd and onAfterUpdate return Me 'de-activate just in case 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim res As Item Dim thisItem As Item = Me thisItem = Me.newItem(Me.GetType(),"get") thisItem.setID(Me.GetID()) thisItem.setAttribute("select","top_hierarchy_node_id,name,state,toc_itemtype_id(name),owned_by_id,managed_by_id,team_id") thisItem.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") thisItem = thisItem.apply() If thisItem.isError() Then Return thisItem
Dim SQLstr As String Dim updateValue As String
'check if top_hierarchy_node_id is set ' if not, create new Document Section and link it to this id ' on new Document Section set properties: ' header_item_type and header_item_id_string to thisType and thisId Dim topDocumentHierachyNodeId As String = thisItem.getProperty("top_hierarchy_node_id","") Dim nodeName As String = thisItem.getProperty("name","") If topDocumentHierachyNodeId = "" Then 'create the top document Section Dim topDocSection As Item = Me.newItem("Document Section","add") topDocSection.setProperty("short_name", "-->") topDocSection.setProperty("is_root", "1") topDocSection.setProperty("name", nodeName) topDocSection.setProperty("header_item_type", thisItem.GetType()) topDocSection.setProperty("header_item_id_string", thisItem.GetID()) topDocSection.setProperty("header_item_name", nodeName)
If thisItem.getProperty("owned_by_id","") = "" Then Dim aliasId As String = Me.getInnovator().getUserAliases() If (aliasId <> "") Then aliasId = aliasId.Substring(0,32) Dim AliasItem = Me.getInnovator().getItemById("Identity", aliasId) If (AliasItem.getItemCount() =1) Then topDocSection.setProperty("owned_by_id", AliasItem.getAttribute("id")) topDocSection.setPropertyAttribute("owned_by_id", "keyed_name", AliasItem.getProperty("keyed_name", "")) End If End If Else topDocSection.setProperty("owned_by_id", thisItem.getProperty("owned_by_id","")) End If topDocSection.setProperty("managed_by_id", thisItem.getProperty("managed_by_id","")) topDocSection.setProperty("team_id", thisItem.getProperty("team_id","")) topDocSection = topDocSection.apply() If topDocSection.isError() Then Return topDocSection
' update link (id) to Document Section via SQL update ... Dim tableName As String = "[" & CCO.DB.GenerateTableName(thisItem.GetType()) & "]" SQLstr = "UPDATE " & tableName & " SET"
updateValue = topDocSection.GetID() SQLstr = SQLstr & tableName & ".top_hierarchy_node_id='" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".id='" & thisItem.getProperty("id","") & "'" res= Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return res
Else 'update the top document section to synch 'owner and co-Owner on top node Dim tableName As String = "[" & CCO.DB.GenerateTableName("Document Section") & "]" SQLstr = "UPDATE " & tableName
updateValue = thisItem.getProperty("owned_by_id","Null") If updateValue <> "Null" Then updateValue = "'" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & " SET " & tableName & ".owned_by_id=" & updateValue
updateValue = thisItem.getProperty("managed_by_id","Null") If updateValue <> "Null" Then updateValue = "'" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".managed_by_id=" & updateValue
updateValue = thisItem.getProperty("team_id","Null") If updateValue <> "Null" Then updateValue = "'" & updateValue & "'" SQLstr = SQLstr & "," & tableName & ".team_id=" & updateValue
SQLstr = SQLstr & " WHERE " & tableName & ".id='" & topDocumentHierachyNodeId & "'" res= Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return res
End If
Return Me
